ComicInfo.Summary:
In "The Mortian," Morty's crash landed on a random planet, and he's all by himself... just waiting for Rick to rescue him... when he runs into a race of cute alien creatures. How badly is he gonna screw this entire place up?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Marc Ellerby & Sarah Stern | 1 | B | Cover B | Savanna Ganucheau | 2 | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Kyle Starks & Sarah Stern | Missing | RE | GalaxyCon Exclusive Variant Cover | Greg Kirkpatrick | Missing |
